thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-DPW Holdings Says Sent Letter Dated February 16, To Michael Pudil, Chairman And CEO Of WSI Industries

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-DPW Holdings Says Sent Letter Dated February 16, To Michael Pudil, Chairman And CEO Of WSI Industries
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - WSI Industries Inc:
* DPW HOLDINGS INC SAYS SENT LETTER DATED FEBRUARY 16, TO MICHAEL PUDIL, CHAIRMAN AND CEO OF WSI INDUSTRIES INC - SEC FILING
* DPW HOLDINGS SAYS IN LETTER, INTENDS TO COMMENCE TENDER OFFICER TO ACQUIRE MAJORITY OF SHARES OF WSI INDUSTRIES AT PROPOSED PRICE OF $6PER SHARE IN CASH
* DPW HOLDINGS INC REPORTS 8.8 PERCENT STAKE IN WSI INDUSTRIES INC AS OF FEB 20 Source text: ( bit.ly/2BHqoJq ) Further company coverage:
